reviews.review: Uhh, i don't know if I'm being dumb. But i had a ton of Valve games already in my library, and I'm wondering if it's like a reward on Steam or something? (some of my friends also have titles like Half life and Portal in they're library, but others don't)
oyun gayet iyi ileride cok zorlasƒ±yo
Wowww bloo to yellow bri'ish robot very cool
I dont have friends so i only played the story mode
The physics are better then unreal engine
love everything about this game, especially GLaDOS!

Absolutely fantastic game. Interesting, humorous story. Challenging puzzles with little to no time-based racing against timers. That kinda ruined the first Portal for me. It appears they did not include the frustrating aspects of the first one in this game.
This is a very good game and has extremely smooth and exciting game play.
I spent all my money on this game and I don't regret it, its very fun and you should get it :)

Late to the party. The original Portal is one of the best puzzle games of all time. This is more of that and then some, plus Stephen Merchant adds an extra layer of excellence to this fantastic sequel.
very fun and very easy to rage

Una historia encantadora con la que es imposible no encari√±arse de ella y sus personajes.
Es un juego muy bien hecho... 7 hrs muy bien gastadas de mi vida.
very sex game. glados is realyl hot and i busted to her
A classic.  After not playing it for a while, I get the itch, and the itch can only be scratched by a run through Cave Johnson's (thank you, J. K. Simmons!) house of horrors.
Best portal game, awsome storyline , great mechanics
very good cool game 10/10 totally recommend!
super leuk spel heel realistisch voor zo oud spel
